name: Swiss Aviation School GmbH
about: Swiss Aviation Training (SAT), a fully-owned subsidiary of Swiss International Air Lines, specializes in providing comprehensive training for commercial pilots, cabin personnel, and aircraft mechanics. Located beside Zurich Airport, SAT leverages extensive industry expertise with a workforce of around 300 employees. The school offers type-specific pilot training courses approved by JAA/EASA and FOCA, utilizing advanced simulators for various aircraft types. SAT also provides cabin crew training compliant with EU-OPS requirements and human factors training using innovative methods. With a strong focus on quality and compliance, SAT ensures its training programs meet the highest standards recognized by global aviation authorities. SAT is committed to delivering top-notch training to prepare professionals for successful careers in aviation.
services:
["IR / CBIR - Instrument Rating
PPL / LAPL - Private Pilot
NIT - Night VFR
HPA - High Performance Aircraft
Class Rating Piper Meridian PA-46 SET
MOU - Mountain Flying
MI - Mountain Instructor"]
